data.name: Judo Home Loan
data.description: The Judo Home Loan offers the choice of variable or fixed interest rate and tailored repayment options, with a choice of principal and interest or interest only. Only available to business lending customers.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Only available with Judo Business lending products

fees.name: Other Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Other fees are defined and calculated as part of the business lending application.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: This comparison rate encompasses an Application Fee of $600 and is based on a $500000 loan over 30 years.Other loan setup fees such as valuation fees,property registration fees and stamp duty, have not been included and will be determined upon credit assessment.
